name: Simple Easy Google Analytics
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description:
This Simple Easy Google Analytics plugin enables you to track your site using the latest Google Analytics tracking code. you can use it by adding simple your analytics it or whole analytics code. This plugin is very simple in terms of use

For Support Contact Us

Google Analytics

Google Analytics Documentation

Google Analytics Tracking JS
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-easy-google-analytics.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your Google Analytics code or Google Analytics client id.
  4. And start tracing it on Google Analytics Dashboard
sections.faq:
1. It is free ?
    Yes.- Simple Easy Google Analytics is totaly free and there is no extra charges for used this plugin
  2. It is Configurable ?
    Yes.- Simple Easy Google Analytics is configurable from admin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload simple-easy-google-analytics.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your Google Analytics code or Google Analytics client id.
  4. And start tracing it on Google Analytics Dashboard
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Simple Easy Google Analytics is ready for production.
